Title: Requires rental vehicle companies which rent a vehicle with a height of greater than six feet to furnish such rental vehicle with a list of all height restricted bridges in New York state
Summary: Requires rental vehicle companies which rent a vehicle with a height of greater than six feet to furnish such rental vehicle with a list of all height restricted bridges in New York state.
LawCode: Amd ยง396-z, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to certain rental vehicle protections
